coreAttributes.name: dose of denial
coreAttributes.description: A small, blue pill, individually packaged in a foil and plastic wrapper. While the text printed on the foil identifies this pill as an 'Orally-Administered Climax Inhibitor', it's colloquially known as either a 'bluer' or 'o-blocker', and temporarily removes the ability to orgasm when ingested. Normally, the effects of this pill last no more than a week.
coreAttributes.applyEffects:
#IF(npc.hasStatusEffect(SE_deniedDollMaker_denied_doll_seal))

[style.colourRed([npc.Name] [npc.is] already under the effects '[#SE_deniedDollMaker_denied_doll_seal.getName(npc)]' nothing happens!)]

#ELSE [##npc.addStatusEffect(SE_deniedDollMaker_denied_doll_seal, 60*60*24*7)]

The little blue pill easily slides down [npc.namePos] throat, and after only a few moments [npc.she] [npc.verb(feel)] a pulsing warmth taking root deep within [npc.her] loins. An arcane glow surrounds [npc.her] crotch and then fades away.

[style.colourRed([npc.Name] [npc.is] now experiencing '[#SE_deniedDollMaker_denied_doll_seal.getName(npc)]' for the next 7 days!)]

#ENDIF

useDescriptions.selfUse: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pop)] a small turquoise pill out of its little foil wrapper, before quickly placing it in [npc.her] mouth and swallowing it down.
useDescriptions.otherUse: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pop)] a small turquoise pill out of its little foil wrapper, before bringing it up to [npc2.namePos] [npc2.lips], forcing it into [npc2.her] mouth, and making sure that [npc2.she] [npc2.verb(swallow)] it down.
